2019-Dec-12 09:54:12 by bbockelm:
First round of fixes here: https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor/pull/86

There was one embedded question in the code review that did not result in a code change:

  Why does setRuntimeAds() have const std::string & input parameters, instead of just basic std::string objects?

This avoids a copy of the std::string in order to call the function (as all the function is doing is making a copy of the string). The result is one copy is made instead of two.
